name: Monstrous Flavours
description:
A short game about managing a potion store while chatting with customers. It’s about a typical day in a potion seller’s shop. You listen to the customers and learn more about their day

Features:

  • Potion Craft System
  • One-way dialogue system
  • Multiple story characters
  • And also cute cats?

Made by these people:

Salih Ünal (Coder)

Deniz Nazlı Mutlu (Artist)

Pelin Alvo (Artist)

Ahmad Bator Darzabi (Writer)

Emir Kasım Demirhan (Sound Designer)
